 2008-10732008-06-12,  ,  HERITAGE,  , 
ActConstitution Act, 1867
PrecisAppointment of the following judges to serve as ADMINISTRATOR of the Government of BRITISH COLUMBIA: - The Hon. PATRICK DOHM - from July 13, 2008 to July 20, 2008, inclusive and from August 9, 2008 to August 25, 2008, inclusive; - The Hon. KEITH BRACKEN - from July 21, 2008 to August 8, 2008, inclusive.
